content.text:
# S. P. Venkateshwaran

S. P. Venkateshwaran, colloquially referred to as The Darling of Dharmapuri, is an Indian politician who is a Member of Legislative Assembly of Tamil Nadu. He was elected from Dharmapuri as a Pattali Makkal Katchi candidate in 2021. In 2025, Venkateshwaran declared support for PMK President Anbumani Ramadoss, which resulted in him being censured by party founder S. Ramadoss, and, along with 2 other PMK MLAs, later joined the faction of the PMK led by Anbumani.
